task.title: Download the Media Module for JavaScript
task.shortdesc: The media module for JavaScript is included in the AppMeasurement for JavaScript download.

context.p: If you are using AppMeasurement for JavaScript 1.x, paste the contents of AppMeasurement_Module_Media.js just above the ============== DO NOT ALTER ANYTHING BELOW THIS LINE ! =============== comment.
If you are using H Code, find the media module and remove the surrounding comments:
